snippet: Buddy Hield hit all seven of his 3-point shots and scored 25 points as No. 19 Oklahoma coasted in its season opener, beating Southeastern Louisiana 78-53 Sunday....

headline.print_headline: Hield Hits All 7 3s, No. 19 Oklahoma Beats SE La
headline.main: Hield Hits All 7 3s, No. 19 Oklahoma Beats SE La

lead_paragraph: Buddy Hield hit all seven of his 3-point shots and scored 25 points as No. 19 Oklahoma coasted in its season opener, beating Southeastern Louisiana 78-53 Sunday.
